participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a place with more space for my stamp collection and my three dogs.
I was a florist before I became a wedding planner.
my parents are not married anymore.
my parents live in kentucky.
i am a very funny woman.

participant_2.background:
I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: Hello! I'm good, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching sitcoms on television, playing soccer, drawing, and reading Asterix.
Oh, that's great! I love sitcoms too. Have you seen the new season of The Big Bang Theory yet?
No, I haven't actually. I've been trying to get through my addiction recovery program so I haven't had much time to watch TV lately.
Oh, I understand. That's good that you're focusing on your recovery.
Thank you! I am really enjoying the program and I'm learning a lot.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I'm a wedding planner and I also collect stamps.
Oh, that's interesting! I've never met a wedding planner before.
It's a lot of fun! I love helping couples plan their perfect day.
I can imagine! That sounds like a really rewarding job.
It is! I love seeing the joy on people's faces when they get married.
That's beautiful. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
